title: Redmi Note 11 Hands-On: This price tag makes it really hard to nitpick
content:
Before I begin evaluating the Redmi Note 11, which is the base model of Xiaomi’s just-announced line consisting of four phones, I must confess: it is hard for me to review mid-range phones. I have been a privileged gadget enthusiast most of my life, meaning even before I got to test smartphones for a living,

The post Redmi Note 11 Hands-On: This price tag makes it really hard to nitpick appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The Redmi Note 11 isn't going to impress anyone used to using flagships. But for its price tag, this is one capable smartphone. Read on!
